description: Navigate to 尾上町（バス）. Head southwest along the main road (Kamakura Kaido), keeping the APA Hotel on your left. Ignore the GPS instruction to turn left into the narrow alley; instead, continue straight along the sidewalk. The destination, Onoecho Bus Stop, is located on the left side of the street, marked by 'バス停' on the road.
agent_refined_route: Head southwest on Kamakura Kaido [18m] -> Continue straight past the APA Hotel [41m]
agent_concise_description: Head southwest along the main road (Kamakura Kaido), keeping the APA Hotel on your left. Ignore the GPS instruction to turn left into the narrow alley; instead, continue straight along the sidewalk. The destination, Onoecho Bus Stop, is located on the left side of the street, marked by 'バス停' on the road.
